{"id":632778425,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 11 months","timestamp":1643782510,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/632778425/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n=nums.size();\n        vector<vector<int>>res;\n        if(n<3)\n            return res;\n        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)\n        {\n            if(i>0 && nums[i]==nums[i-1])\n                continue;\n            int left=i+1;\n            int right=n-1;\n            while(left<right)\n            {\n                int s=nums[i]+nums[left]+nums[right];\n                if(s>0)\n                    right--;\n                else if(s<0)\n                    left++;\n                else\n                {\n                    res.push_back(vector<int>{nums[i],nums[left],nums[right]});\n                    right--;\n                    left++;\n                }\n            }\n           \n        }\n         return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
